attributes.action: Enforce a no fly zone over Ukraine to protect the people of Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: Sanctions are not enough. Innocent people are dying and we can no longer stand by and watch. Russian forces continued to shell the Ukrainian city of Mariupol, despite agreeing to a ceasefire just hours earlier. Enough is enough. We must do the right thing and support those innocent people in dire need of our help and in the full knowledge that this may lead to a larger war in Europe or even a nuclear war. We are prepared to accept that possibility but it will be on Putin's head not ours
attributes.background: To enforce a no fly zone over Ukraine to protect the people of Ukraine from Russian attack. This will likely mean shooting down Russian planes in Ukrainian airspace.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Seek to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
